com.pump.io

Class ConsoleLogger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.io.FileLogger
      • com.pump.io.ConsoleLogger

  • public class ConsoleLogger
extends FileLogger
    This logs the System.err and System.out streams to a text file.
    See Also:
    BasicConsole
